title: Emotional Release
subtitle: Move what's stuck, free what's trapped
description: Learn safe, effective techniques for releasing stuck emotions. This course teaches somatic approaches to processing grief, anger, fear, and other emotions that have been held in the body. Move from chronic holding to healthy flow.

modules.title: Understanding Stuck Emotions
modules.description: Why emotions get trapped and how to recognize holding patterns

modules.title: Preparing for Release
modules.description: Creating safety and building capacity for emotional work

modules.title: Releasing Grief
modules.description: Processing loss, sadness, and unexpressed sorrow

modules.title: Releasing Anger
modules.description: Moving rage safely and reclaiming your power

modules.title: Integration and Flow
modules.description: Building ongoing emotional health and preventing future buildup

whatYouLearn: Recognize where emotions are stuck in your body
Create safe containers for emotional release
Specific techniques for grief, anger, and fear release
How to move emotional energy without overwhelm
Somatic approaches that bypass the rational mind
Build ongoing practices for emotional flow
requirements: Completion of nervous system basics helpful but not required
Private space for physical/vocal release practices
Basic physical mobility for movement exercises
